Html:
I do not want a entire "ALL" content of Additionaldata.
e.g
.\Get-WindowsInventoryToClixml.ps1 -Computername cenpr012  -AdditionalData "All"

But I would like to have only  "InstalledApplications" and "InstalledPatches" among the additional data members in my inventory.
can anyone please let me know how to use it?
